title: Creating a reading list on multi-party conversations (MPC) involves selecting articles that cover various aspects of the topic, including theoretical foundations, computational models, and applications. Here is a list of 20 articles that you might find useful
**"Multi-Party Conversations in the Wild: A Large-Scale Dataset and Its Insights"** - This article provides a comprehensive dataset for studying MPCs and discusses key insights derived from it
**"Dialogue Systems for Multi-Party Conversations: Challenges and Opportunities"** - A review of the challenges faced by dialogue systems in handling MPCs and potential research opportunities
**"Modeling Turn-Taking in Multi-Party Conversations"** - This paper explores computational models for predicting turn-taking behavior in MPCs
**"Speech and Gesture Coordination in Multi-Party Conversations"** - An analysis of how speech and non-verbal cues are coordinated in MPCs
**"Role Recognition in Multi-Party Conversations"** - Discusses methods for identifying and classifying participant roles in MPCs
**"Emotion Detection in Multi-Party Conversations Using Deep Learning"** - A study on using deep learning techniques to detect emotions in MPCs
**"Multi-Party Conversational Agents: Design and Evaluation"** - This article focuses on the design and evaluation of conversational agents capable of participating in MPCs
**"Analyzing Power Dynamics in Multi-Party Conversations"** - An examination of how power dynamics manifest and can be analyzed in MPCs
**"Cross-Cultural Differences in Multi-Party Conversations"** - A comparative study of how MPCs vary across different cultural contexts
**"Real-Time Processing of Multi-Party Conversations"** - Techniques and challenges associated with processing MPCs in real-time
**"Multi-Party Conversational Data: Collection and Annotation"** - Discusses methodologies for collecting and annotating data for MPC research
**"Topic Segmentation in Multi-Party Conversations"** - Approaches to segmenting topics within MPCs for better understanding and analysis
**"Machine Learning Approaches to Multi-Party Conversation Analysis"** - An overview of machine learning techniques applied to MPC analysis
**"The Impact of Technology on Multi-Party Conversations"** - Investigates how technology influences the dynamics and structure of MPCs
**"Multi-Party Conversations in Virtual Reality Environments"** - Explores the unique challenges and opportunities of MPCs in virtual reality settings
**"Conversational Strategies in Multi-Party Negotiations"** - Analyzes strategies used in MPCs during negotiation scenarios
**"Automatic Summarization of Multi-Party Conversations"** - Techniques for summarizing the content of MPCs automatically
**"Multi-Party Conversations in Healthcare Settings"** - Examines the role and dynamics of MPCs in healthcare environments
**"Ethical Considerations in Multi-Party Conversation Analysis"** - Discusses the ethical implications of analyzing and modeling MPCs
**"Future Directions in Multi-Party Conversation Research"** - A forward-looking article that outlines potential future research directions in the field of MPCs
These articles should provide a well-rounded understanding of the current state of research in multi-party conversations. Be sure to check academic databases and journals for access to these articles
